summary:
The Premier League is the top football league in England, with 20 teams. It was started in 1992 when the top clubs wanted to break away from the English Football League. The season runs from August to May, with each team playing 38 games.

It's a big money-maker, with a huge TV deal worth billions. The league is very popular worldwide, shown in 212 countries. The average attendance is over 38,000, and it's ranked as the best league in Europe.

Manchester United has won the most titles (13), and six clubs have won the European Champions League.
title: Premier League
